The Emirates FA Cup first round proper draw will take place on the evening of Monday 17 October, following the weekend's fourth round qualifying ties.

articles.title: Sources: Man City line up Sam Curtis offer after Roma trial - Football Insider
articles.description: Sources have told Football Insider that Man City are racing to sign Irish teenage sensation Sam Curtis after trials at multiple clubs
articles.content:
Man City are racing to sign Irish teenage sensation Sam Curtis, sources have told Football Insider.
The defender, 16, is already an established first-team member of League of Ireland side St Patrick… [+1531 chars]
